name: Chandanalepa Face Cream
description: Chandanalepa Herbal Cream incorporates the essence and fragrance of Sandalwood, Pure Sandalwood Oil, Venivel (Yellow vine), Kokun Bark, Suwanda Kottan, Indian Turmeric, Velmadata and other high valuable indigenous Ayurvedic drugs to bring you a unique cream for beautiful skin and complexion. It can protect your skin from high exposure to sunlight or extreme cold temperatures. Keeps skin healthy by removing dryness and acts effectively against mycoses, pimples, blackheads, whiteheads, spots, discoloring and darkening. It moisturizes and nourishes your skin while giving a golden complexion. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
